collection.name: The child of Connection
collection.openText: The doorway to a new world fully opens.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When an Attachment Work was completed with the result was good, Connections would be built among employees. When one employee in a Connection takes damage, employees in the same Connection will take a small amount of damage and reduce the damage to the original victim meanwhile.
When a Connection was built between two employees from different Connections, the two Connections would be merged.
When an Repress Work was completed, the last change of Connections would be withdrawn. However, when an employee with Connection died, all previous changes would be unable to be withdrawn.

$0 couldn't build too much Connections. Every attempt to do that would make every employees with Connection "Unconnected". Then if an Repress Work was completed, all "Unconnected" employees would panic instantly and the statement of Connections would reset.
$0 is not affected by Qliphoth Meltdowns.
